section.title: Provenance Links
section.t: Provenance links establish a verifiable connection between the evidence chain and the resulting published content.

section.title: Content Binding
section.t: The final evidence packet in a chain MUST contain a content binding that includes:

list.t: The SHA-256 hash of the final document content.
A COSE_Sign1 signature over the content hash using the Attester's device key.
The chain head reference (hash of the first evidence packet) to enable full chain traversal.

section.title: Publication Attestation
section.t: When content is published, the publisher MAY act as an additional Endorser by co-signing the provenance link, creating a three-party attestation chain: Attester (author), Endorser (publisher), and Verifier (reader or auditor).
